meanings.definition: To have sexual intercourse with someone.
meanings.sent1: They shtupped in the bedroom last night.
meanings.sent2: He shtupped his girlfriend after their date.
meanings.sent3: The birds and the bees shtupped in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The engine shtupped the car forward with power.
meanings.sent5: The storm shtupped the town with heavy rain.

meanings.definition: Past tense of the verb 'shtup', meaning to have sex with someone.
meanings.sent1: She shtupped him before they broke up.
meanings.sent2: They shtupped behind the school last week.
meanings.sent3: The cat shtupped the mouse in the cartoon.
meanings.sent4: The wind shtupped the leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake shtupped the city awake.
